timeline.bodyText: ohlala, nop, we just dropped a test here.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

replies.bodyText:
If you look at the log of the QA, you will see com.sonar.it.java.JspTest.
I move JspTest out of JavaTestSuite because it requires a different version of SQ.
But it is still executed because of the pom.xml <include>com/sonar/it/java/*Test.java</include>
replies.author: alban-auzeill

timeline.author: m-g-sonar
